title: Status Update on the New Mexico Shroud of Turin Museum
author: Andy

title: Status Update on the New Mexico Shroud of Turin Museum
post:
On behalf of Centro Português de Sindonologia I want to express our sympathy on your project.
God bless you
                                                     Antero de Frias Moreira
author: Antero de Frias Moreira

title: Status Update on the New Mexico Shroud of Turin Museum
post:
Thank you, Antero.  We are working, but it is a massive job.  When done right, it will be a place to visit for those who, in some cases, come here on vacation to see SEAM and a couple other local attractions.
God bless you and all at Centro Português de Sindonologia.
Andy Weiss
author: Andy

title: Status Update on the New Mexico Shroud of Turin Museum
post: I posted an update on http://ShroudNM.com Nov 25th.
author: Andy
